2006-2010 BalaBit IT Security Ltd.
Eleventh March 18, 2010
This manual is the primary documentation of the syslog-ng 3.0 product line, including syslog-ng Open Source Edition (syslog-ng OSE), syslog-ng Premium Edition (syslog-ng PE), and the syslog-ng Agent for Windows (which is a part of syslog-ng PE). &legalnotice;
Eleventh March 18, 2010 Several minor corrections and clarifications.
Tenth January 8, 2010 Documented the type parameter of filters and rewrite rules, several updates to the Windows agent documentation, and other minor corrections.
Ninth November 6, 2009 Corrected the minimal requirements of the System i agent, as well as the XML configuration of the Windows agent.
Eighth October 30, 2009 Several minor clarifications and typo corrections.
Seventh August 19, 2009 Updated to syslog-ng Agent for Windows version 3.0.4, including the description of the new XML-based configuration file of the agent. Notes on escaping special characters in pattern database rule pattern were also added to . The log_disk_fifo_size() parameter was removed from the list of global syslog-ng options, because it must be set separately for every destination.
Sixth July 31, 2009 Updated to syslog-ng Open Source Edition version 3.0.3, and documented the pattern database (db_parser()) feature: see , , and for details. Also many smaller corrections and clarifications.
Fifth February 6, 2009 Updated to syslog-ng Premium Edition version 3.0.2
Fourth December 12, 2008 Several typo corrections, clarifications, and other cleanups.
Third October 31, 2008 Updated to cover version 3.0.3 of the syslog-ng Agent for Windows application.
Second October 8, 2008 Added documentation on installing syslog-ng from .run binaries, and various updates and corrections.
First October 2, 2008 Initial release for review

preface.title: Preface
preface.para: Welcome to the syslog-ng Administrator Guide!
This document describes how to configure and manage syslog-ng. Background information for the technology and concepts used by the product is also discussed.

section.title: Summary of contents
section.para: describes the main functionality and purpose of syslog-ng.
discusses the technical concepts and philosophies behind syslog-ng.
provides detailed description on configuring and managing syslog-ng as a client or a server.
describes how to install syslog-ng on various UNIX-based platforms using the precompiled binaries, and how to compile syslog-ng Open Source Edition from source.
describes how to install and configure the syslog-ng Agent for Windows application.
describes how to install and configure the syslog-ng Agent for IBM System i application.
gives recommendations to configure special features of syslog-ng.
is a reference guide of syslog-ng, describing all available parameters and options.
